description:
Long days in the saddle need comfy shorts, good thing these are comfy shorts. From dropping the hammer on your weekend club ride, to casual café stops with friends, the Signature shorts are a great option.

  • Stretchy nylon blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Women’s specific chamois uses varying thicknesses and varying foam densities to maximize comfort
  • Wide cuff (2.5in.) and gripper elastic at the hem keep the legs from riding up
  • Reflective band on the leg helps keep you seen
  • UPF50+ protection, blocking more than 98% of harsh UV
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabrics add confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Regular fit offers a trim, aerodynamic fit, without being too snug
name: Peppermint Signature Shorts - Women's
